fullplot: Two punks live in Salt Lake City. The film covers their all-day routine. The realism of the character-narrated movie may be discussed. One of the punks gets ill, stays in hospital for three weeks, comes out again. Three parties are covered and one concert including a fight between punks, rednecks and others.
plot: In the early 1980s Stevo and Heroin Bob are the only two dedicated punks in conservative Salt Lake City.
title: SLC Punk!
